typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as short,
		empname as string,
		department as string,
		designation as string,
		salary as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['empdata2.csv']) ~> source2
source(output(
		empid as short,
		empname as string,
		department as string,
		designation as string,
		salary as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['empdata.csv']) ~> source3
source2 derive(idName = md5(empid,empname)) ~> DerivedColumn1
source3 derive(idempname = md5(empid,empname)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1, DerivedColumn2 exists(idName == idempname,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
